Pre-Game Insights: India have done well in the ICC T20 World Cup, winning three out of their four matches.
A win would assure India of a place in the semi-finals as the group toppers.
Zimbabwe have blown hot and cold in the tournament, with their only win in the Super 12 phase coming against Pakistan.
Zimbabwe will bank on their pace attack to pave the way for a surprise win.
The pitch at the MCG is a decent one to bat on with the average score being 160.
The pacers have enjoyed the conditions at the MCG, picking up over 60 percent of the wickets.
Chasing could be the preferred option, with the pitch not likely to change much during the course of the game.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game is set to take place at 1:30 PM IST at the Melbourne Cricket Ground.
The live score and commentary of the game can be followed in the Sportskeeda Live Score section.
